trans-unit.source: Checklist Answers are set up on the cc|configure to order menu by clicking Checklists > Checklist Answers.

seg-source.mrk: Checklist Answers are set up on the cc|configure to order menu by clicking Checklists > Checklist Answers.

trans-unit.source: With selection of a checklist answer number in a Checklist Template, the information entered here is copied into the template.

seg-source.mrk: With selection of a checklist answer number in a Checklist Template, the information entered here is copied into the template.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier of the answer that can contain up to 20 characters.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier of the answer that can contain up to 20 characters.

trans-unit.source: Definition of the kind of answer. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Definition of the kind of answer.

trans-unit.source: Answer – Assigned to a question but no further dependence between question and answer exists. If the More Answers Possible check box is not selected in the checklist question, only one answer for each question can be selected.

seg-source.mrk: Answer – Assigned to a question but no further dependence between question and answer exists.
If the More Answers Possible check box is not selected in the checklist question, only one answer for each question can be selected.

trans-unit.source: Selection Option – Assigned to a question and normally do not have their own variables. The value of a selection option is entered in the Input field of the question (refer to topic “Variable/Attribute Types” on page 1 for additional information about using this checklist answer type).

seg-source.mrk: Selection Option – Assigned to a question and normally do not have their own variables.
The value of a selection option is entered in the Input field of the question (refer to topic “Variable/Attribute Types” on page 1 for additional information about using this checklist answer type).

trans-unit.source: Designation of the checklist answer. This description appears in the checklist. The description can be a maximum of 50 characters.

seg-source.mrk: This description appears in the checklist.
The description can be a maximum of 50 characters.

trans-unit.source: Contains the translation code generated from the “Find/Create Translation” function. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766028" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the translation code generated from the “Find/Create Translation” function.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766028" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Default language of the checklist answer or the translated language that is available for the answer if the “Find/Create Translation” function is run; used with checklist translations (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766033" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Default language of the checklist answer or the translated language that is available for the answer if the “Find/Create Translation” function is run; used with checklist translations (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766033" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Contains the translated description if translations are used. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766039" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the translated description if translations are used.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766039" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: This field is only relevant with a Type of Selection Option.

seg-source.mrk: This field is only relevant with a Type of Selection Option.

trans-unit.source: With this value, further calculation is then accomplished in the checklist. So the question about a color can be assigned the answer, for example, blue = value 1.

seg-source.mrk: With this value, further calculation is then accomplished in the checklist.
So the question about a color can be assigned the answer, for example, blue = value 1.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value appears in the Input field of the checklist question. If no value is assigned, the description of the answer in the Input field is assigned.

seg-source.mrk: The assigned value appears in the Input field of the checklist question.
If no value is assigned, the description of the answer in the Input field is assigned.

trans-unit.source: Additional description of the answer with a maximum of 80 characters.

seg-source.mrk: Additional description of the answer with a maximum of 80 characters.

trans-unit.source: Default value for an answer. This field is not valid when the Type field is set to Selection Option.

seg-source.mrk: This field is not valid when the Type field is set to Selection Option.

trans-unit.source: Definition of the data type that is expected of an answer. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Definition of the data type that is expected of an answer.

trans-unit.source: Default value for an answer. This field is only valid when the Type field is set to Answer and the Input Type field is set to Boolean.

seg-source.mrk: This field is only valid when the Type field is set to Answer and the Input Type field is set to Boolean.

trans-unit.source: In this field, additional remarks can be entered to the question up to 80 characters.

seg-source.mrk: In this field, additional remarks can be entered to the question up to 80 characters.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, an answer to a question can be assigned to a sub-checklist. In this field, the code of the sub-checklist is registered (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Sub Checklists.htm#_Ref369439820" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Sub-Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: If necessary, an answer to a question can be assigned to a sub-checklist.

In this field, the code of the sub-checklist is registered (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Sub Checklists.htm#_Ref369439820" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Sub-Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: The answer to the question (in the Input field in the checklist) can be stored for further use in the checklist or in the dynamic BOM as a variable. The variables have a global validity within the checklist and the Master BOMs.

seg-source.mrk: The answer to the question (in the Input field in the checklist) can be stored for further use in the checklist or in the dynamic BOM as a variable.
The variables have a global validity within the checklist and the Master BOMs.

trans-unit.source: In this field, the exact rounding of the input number can be determined.

seg-source.mrk: In this field, the exact rounding of the input number can be determined.

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the input number is to be rounded. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates how the input number is to be rounded.

trans-unit.source: In these fields, assign a range of values to an answer.

seg-source.mrk: In these fields, assign a range of values to an answer.

trans-unit.source: In this field, the color of the text in the Description field is specified. The options are black, blue, red [italicized], green [bolded] and yellow.

seg-source.mrk: In this field, the color of the text in the Description field is specified.
The options are black, blue, red [italicized], green [bolded] and yellow.

trans-unit.source: If selected, the text in the Description field is bolded on the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the text in the Description field is bolded on the checklist.

trans-unit.source: This field has no style influence when Description Color = yellow (never bolded) or green (always bolded).

seg-source.mrk: This field has no style influence when Description Color = yellow (never bolded) or green (always bolded).

trans-unit.source: If selected, then input is required on this answer line.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, then input is required on this answer line.

trans-unit.source: This field is used when a checklist answer is made with a Component Type of Item. Use the arrow in the Input field for this answer line to see and select from the items that belong to this item category.

seg-source.mrk: This field is used when a checklist answer is made with a Component Type of Item.
Use the arrow in the Input field for this answer line to see and select from the items that belong to this item category.

trans-unit.source: Displays an uploaded picture for the Checklist Answer; uses standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV picture insertion functionality.

seg-source.mrk: Displays an uploaded picture for the Checklist Answer; uses standard Microsoft Dynamics NAV picture insertion functionality.

trans-unit.source: When answers are added to a Checklist Template/Document Checklist line, assigned pictures are copied to the Checklist Picture FactBox and Picture field in the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: When answers are added to a Checklist Template/Document Checklist line, assigned pictures are copied to the Checklist Picture FactBox and Picture field in the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: : Checklist Answer Card, Dyn. Checklist FastTab
Formula Function / Value of Function / Value of Function is Default / Always Overwrite / Formula Show Line / Show Line / Formula Message / Automatic Recalculation

seg-source.mrk: Formula Function / Value of Function / Value of Function is Default / Always Overwrite / Formula Show Line / Show Line / Formula Message / Automatic Recalculation

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Dynamic Checklist.htm#_Ref406766052" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Dynamic Checklist” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Dynamic Checklist.htm#_Ref406766052" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Dynamic Checklist” on page 1</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the component type. The options are:

When a component type is used, the related G/L account, item, resource, and work/machine center can be selected in the Input field on the line (refer to topics “Example – Dynamic Linkage of Items” on page 1 and “Example – Dynamic Linkage of Work and Machine Centers” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: When a component type is used, the related G/L account, item, resource, and work/machine center can be selected in the Input field on the line (refer to topics “Example – Dynamic Linkage of Items” on page 1 and “Example – Dynamic Linkage of Work and Machine Centers” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: If the Component Type field is set to Item, then a component variant can be selected.

seg-source.mrk: If the Component Type field is set to Item, then a component variant can be selected.
